CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests that perform-undo-perform of the mergeable action does not crash.

Initial value
[expanded] 
element.style { ()

[expanded] 
.container { (<style>…</style>)
    font-weight: bold;

[expanded] 
div { (user agent stylesheet)
    display: block;

After changing property
[expanded] 
element.style { ()

[expanded] 
.container { (<style>…</style>)
    font-weight: normal;

[expanded] 
div { (user agent stylesheet)
    display: block;

After undo
[expanded] 
element.style { ()

[expanded] 
.container { (<style>…</style>)
    font-weight: bold;

[expanded] 
div { (user agent stylesheet)
    display: block;

After perform
[expanded] 
element.style { ()

[expanded] 
.container { (<style>…</style>)
    font-weight: normal;

[expanded] 
div { (user agent stylesheet)
    display: block;
